title: Vomiting Vincent

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The purpose of this game is to discover new body parts that can be used to activate a switch
• Record "Dinner time!" onto the switch and plug in the wired switch
• Use the hand puppet (Vincent) to pick up the wired switch and pretend he has eaten it!
• Then place the wired switch next to a new body part e.g next to the switch user's head and pretend Vincent has vomited up the switch
• When the switch user activates the switch to say "dinner time!" Vincent eats the wired switch and vomits it out next to a new body part

tooltipText: This game helps you find a second body part to activate a switch using a puppet, so you can begin exploring Gear 3 activities.
